item.text: @#/ /mdo sde tha pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA pa ri nirbA Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po
dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ku shi na/ chu klung gser ldan
gyi 'gram/ gyad kyi nyen kor shing sA la zung gi tshal na bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das dge slong bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cus bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpyid zla tha zla
ba nya ba'i nang par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus dang nye bar gyur pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi rang rang gi yul gyi skad du shin tu zur phyin par don brda sprod pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ srid
pa'i rtse mo man chad go bar mdzad de/ deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba can/ 'jig rten thams cad

skyob pa/ sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa skyabs chen po'i gnas dang gzhi bor gyur pa thub pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/ sems can thams cad kyi zhu ba

lung bstan pa tha mal de lta bu'i gsung rnams byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal nas 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rdo'i snying po'i kha dog

lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / dang / lha ma yin dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten

gyi sems can de dag la phog nas/ de'i mod la nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad dang / ngan song dang / mi khom pa thams cad rgyun chad par gyur to/ /de nas mya ngan chen pos non te tshig 'thun par kye ma khebs so khebs so zhes kyang zer to/ /kyi hud

kyi hud ces kyang skad cher 'bod cing lag pa brkyang bas kyang mgo bo la rdobs shing lus 'dar zhing shin tu ngu'o/ /de'i tshe sa chen po nags tshal dang bcas ri dang bcas pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa yang rab tu g.yos te/ sems can de dag kyang gcig

la gcig 'dzin cing 'di skad du grogs po dag grogs po dag / gyad yul gyi grong khyer ku shir 'dong ngo 'dong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa las bzlog la bsgrim mi dgos par

bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhugs par gsol ba gdab bo zhes zer to/ /gcig la gcig 'jus nas 'di skad du/ kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /kye ma sems can rnams kyi bsod nams

kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni zad do/ /las mi bzad pa ni byung ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig /tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng gi yud tsam 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /

kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ bdag cag mgon med pa dang / rtsa lag med pa dang / phongs par ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu/ bdag cag gi the tshom dang som nyi ci dang ci yod pa

de dang de dag zhu bar bya'o zhes kyang zer to/ /nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang de na 'khod de/ 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan kA t+yA ya na chen po dang / gnas brtan bak+ku la dang / gnas brtan nye dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang de na 'khod de/ de dag

la 'od zer gyis phog nas/ 'dar rab tu 'dar/ dam dam rab tu dam dam/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ brtabs rab tu brtabs/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khams rab tu 'khams/ rmugs rab tu rmugs/ rengs rab tu rengs te/ de dag la sogs

pa dag tu gyur nas chas so/ /de'i tshe dge slong sa ya phrag brgyad so shing zos nas phyir byung ste/ gnas brtan de dag la 'od zer gyi snang ba des phog nas shin tu rings par kha gdong bkrus te gcig la gcig 'jus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras de dag thams

cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ cang shes pa/ gtso bo chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa/ tsan dan chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa/ seng ge lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de la

sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba

dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i

tshe ko ta ka'i bu mo rab ma la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ gtso mo chen mo/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang

gi don thob pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ko ta ka'i bu mo dge slong ma rab ma dang / dge slong ma nye dga' mo dang / dge slong ma rgya mtsho blo gros dang / de la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs

kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog

tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas

nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'khor de na dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog sa bcu thob pa sha stag ste/ gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir bud med kyi gzugs dang / bud

med kyi dbyibs dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa mang po dang rus pa'i lus 'chang ba/ rtag tu tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i don byed nus pa sha stag go/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe byang chub sems

dpa' rgya mtshos byin la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang mi mchog sa bcu thob pa/ thabs kyis lus 'chang ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtshos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang / theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ theg pa chen pos bkres pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna

med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o snyam ste/ sngon gyi bskal pa bye ba snyed du tshul khrims kyi bkod pa'i dam bca' ba legs par blangs pa/ 'dzin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa sha stag dang / de bzhin

du bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam pa dang / go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu

med pa dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms par lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad snga dro'i nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/

mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du/ theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs

kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /

yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing / tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa dge bsnyen gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang zung dang zung du shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ sdug bsngal ba

dang / bde ba dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dang / de kho na dang / de kho na ma yin pa dang / skyabs dang / skyabs ma yin pa dang / sems can dang / sems can med pa dang / brtan pa dang / brtan

pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / zhi ba ma yin pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / ther zug dang / ther zug ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang khyad par du 'phags pa

shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen rab sbyin la sogs pa dge bsnyen theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas shing tshul khrims

blangs pa/ theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa dag ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag rgal nas gzhan

bsgral bar bya'o/ /bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi chad par bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la sems gus pa dang / de bzhin du

yon tan grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir re res kyang tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / thang shing

gi mchog dang / tsan dan sa mchog pa'i bud shing rnams dang / yam sreg shing dri bsung dang ldan pa yon tan can lnga stong lnga stong khyer te 'ongs so/ /de la yam sreg shing sna re zhing yang gser gyi skud pa rin po che sna bdun rigs bdun dang ldan pas spras pas dkris pa/

ri mo la bris pa kho na bzhin du 'dug pa/ rang bzhin gyis gzhon sha can legs par bcos pa sha stag ste/ sna re zhing yang 'od rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phung po chen po mdog sngo ba dang / bar bar kha cig tu mdog dkar/ kha cig tu sngo skya/ kha cig tu rtsa dmar/

kha cig tu ser ba/ mig tu sdug par bya ba sha stag go/ /bam po re re'i g.yogs ma'i phyar bu yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag go /chings ma'i the gu mang po re re zhing yang ldong ros kyi mdog lta bu dang / zar ma'i me tog gi mdog lta bu dang / sngon po dang /

ser po rnams kyis bar bar du spel ba sha stag go/ /de la chings ma'i the gu mang po re re zhing yang gser thags kyi mchog rnam par dag pa/ yul mang por grags pa dag gis spel ba sha stag go/ /de la yam sreg shing sna re re zhing yang spos dri bsung zhim po dang / me tog phreng dang /

gur gum gyi phye ma dang ldan par byas pa/ gser thags kyis g.yogs pa/ dar snas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shubs sngon po dang / ser po dang / sngo skya dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka lta bu dag gi nang du bcug pa/ yul ka ling ka'i ras dang / zar ma'i ras dang /

zab dar dang / rgya dar gyi mchog rnams kyis dkris pa/ me tog mang pos brgyan pa/ byug pa dri bsung zhim po dag gis byugs pa sha stag go/ /yam sreg shing sna re'i shing rta re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyis mdzes par

byas pa kha cig /kha cig tu sngon po dang / dkar po dang / bab la'i kha dog dang / li khri'i kha dog pas lhag pa'i 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /shing rta de dag gi gnya' shing rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ dpe med pa/ rta cang shes mgyogs pa dag dang

sbyar ba sha stag go/ /rta de dag kyang rlung gi shugs pas mgyogs pa/ spu kha chu skyar gyi mdog dang / ldong ros kyi mdog dang / sprin gyi mdog can sha stag ste/ thabs de 'dra ba'i shing rta re re'i mdun logs dang rgyab logs su rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste/ rgyal mtshan thams cad kyang

rin po che las byas pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag go/ /rgyal mtshan gyi mdun logs su yang gdugs rtsibs dang rtsa ba nor bu dri ma med pa 'od can las byas pa/ mu tig gi chun po spyangs pa sha stag khyer ro/ /gdugs re re'i mdun logs su yang gser gyi me tog

ku mu da dang / ud pa la dang / pad+ma dkar po sdong bu bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ ze ba rdo rje las byas pa/ bung ba mang po skad 'byin pa/ dri bsung zhim po dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ 'od dang ldan pa/ che ba mang ba sha stag dang / lda ldi chen po sha stag khyer ro/ /lda ldi chen po rnams

kyi mdun du yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi spyod pa ri mor bris pa chen po dag thogs so/ /ri mo'i gzugs re re'i glo g.yas g.yon nas kyang / zlos gar gyi gar thabs yul dbus nas byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ gar thabs byed pa de'i nang na sil snyan

rin po che las byas pa'i rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / rnga zlum dang / pi bang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dag brdung zhing 'bud do/ /gar thabs kyi sil snyan de dag las kyang kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'i

rnam pa brjod cing gdung gdung skad du dbyangs len to/ /gar thabs kyi sil snyan re re'i mdun du yang me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs rnam par 'tsher ba rnams kyi phye mas rin po che'i skon bu legs par bcos pa gzhon sha can dag gis bkang ba sha stag dang / de ma

yin pa'i skon bu mang po blta na sdug pa/ gur gum gyi phye mas bkang ba mang po sha stag thogs so/ /de dag gi mdun du yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa khyab par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas dag khyer zhing 'dong ngo / /zhal zas de

dag kyang bud shing tsan dan dmar po dang / a ga ru dang / thang shing gi me chung ngus btsos pa dang / gang gA'i klung gi chus btsos pa sha stag ste/ skyur ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro dang / mngar ba dang / bska ba dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa/ mdangs skyed pa/ phan

par 'gyur ba sha stag go/ /sA la zung gi drung gi nyen kor thams cad kyang gser gyi bye ma 'jam pos bdal te/ ga pu sha'i ras dang / snam bu dang / btsos snam dang / dre'u rngog dang / ka ling ka'i ras dang / zab dar 'jam zhing mdog dkar ba rnams kyang bting ngo / /

grub pa'i gnas de'i gzhi dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kho ra khor yug kyang gur gum gyis byugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis spras shing snang bar byas pa/ ri rab ltar

che zhing 'phang mtho ba dag kyang bshams so/ /g.yogs ma yang de dag gi rkyen du 'tsham pa sha stag gis g.yogs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka sgra si li li dang / khrol shang gi sgra 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi yol ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ rgya dar spu sdug yug khyim chen

po'i bla re rnams ni bres/ gdugs dkar po rnams kyis ni nyi mtshan bsgribs/ rnga yab dkar po rnams kyis ni g.yabs/ rgyab rten glang po che'i mche ba la chu srin ma ka ra rten pa'i kha nas/ zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba'i mu tig gi chun po 'byung zhing spyangs pa dang ldan pa

rnams ni bcas/ sa phyogs rnams ni me tog dri zhim po'i sil mas gtor to/ /dge bsnyen de dag re re nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin no/ /skom 'dod pa

rnams la ni skom sbyin no/ /mgo bo dang mig la sogs pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin no/ /dbul po dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams la yang 'dod pa dang / dug dang / gnod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i

sbyin pa rnams ma gtogs par gang dang gang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag chog par sbyar ro snyam du sems kyi/ gzhan ni ci yang mi sems so/ /de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sde tshan/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis bsams

pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam ste/ so so nas de 'ba' zhig snying la sems shing yan lag thams cad

kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad bud shing dang / yam sreg shing dang / shing rta dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang /

ba dan rnams dang chas te zhal zas kyi mchog gis sbyar ba'i snod rnams thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dang / me tog phreng dang / phye ma dang / phye ma zhib bu

dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re rgya chen po dag gis mchod nas lan 'bum bskor ba byas te/ mig nas mchi ma rgyun mi chad par char bzhin du phab nas/ bdag nyid la sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po byed cing / kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur

ro/ /kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes de skad du skad po che 'don te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung na srog chags shi shu ma ra bzhin du 'gre ldog cing gsol ba 'debs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor

dang bcas pas bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sbyin pa'i tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes su gsol/ zhes gsol ba 'debs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen bzhin du

cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du de skad ces gsol kyang / lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de cang mi zer bar 'khod nas/ bu gcig pa shi nas

dur khrod du bor ma thag pa'i pha ma 'gre ldog pa bzhin du shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du dge bsnyen de dag thams cad mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa las langs te/ rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan

yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing / tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi gces pa 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen ma tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'tsho ba'i dpal la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang

bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can bye ba phrag mang po nges par sgrol ba/ khyim gyi gnas la smod pa sha stag ste/ lus 'di ni nyes pa'i khams brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las lhags pas bsdus pa'o/ /lus 'di ni srin bu'i rigs bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i zas so/ /

lus 'di ni rgyal po'i khri mon du brubs pa'i dri mnam pa'o/ /lus 'di ni khyi ro rul pa'i dri bam gyis lhag par sbags pa'o/ /lus 'di ni sgo dgu nas mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa'o/ /lus 'di ni sha dang / chu ba dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / pags pa'i zhal zhal can/

rkang lag gi phyi sgo dang / ra ba dang / ba gam can/ mig gi skar khung can/ mgo bo'i yang tog can/ yid rgyal po lta bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu'o/ /lus 'di ni mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs shing byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod chags dang /

zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba snyed kyi srin po brten pa/ 'dam bu dang / e raN+Da dang / dbu ba dang / chu shing lta bur snying po med pa/ glog dang / ri gzar po'i 'bab chu'i dba' rlabs ltar shin tu mi brtan pa'o/ /sgyu ma dang / smig

rgyu dang / brag ca dang / zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar slu bar byed pa/ rlung shugs drag pos rnam par dkrugs pa'i chu'i shugs kyis brkos pa'i 'gram gyi sdong po ltar g.yang sa na 'dug pa'i chos can/ spyang ki dang / wa dang / bya rgod dang / bya rog rnams kyi zas yin na/

su zhig 'di lta bu 'chang ba la dga' bar byed/ rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad skra'i rtse mos blangs te/ ba lang gi rmig rjes su blugs par ni nus srid kyi/ lus nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis gzir ba 'di snying po med pa'am/ mi gtsang ba ni tshig tsam gyis bstan par mi nus so/ /

sa chen po 'di rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i rus pa'i 'bru tsam sha stag tu byas pa'am/ yungs 'bru tsam 'am/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul tsam sha stag tu byas pas ni zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ lus 'di yod kyi bar du 'di'i nyes dmigs ni mthar thug par mi 'gyur te/ de bas

na dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir 'di mchil ma bzhin du dor bar bya'o snyam ste/ 'di ltar dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgoms pas sems bsgoms pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma 'tsho

ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen ma dpal phreng zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen ma sa ga zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ bsrung ba lhur len

pa/ bud med kyi lus ngan no snyam du smod pa dang / lus snying po med do snyam du smod pa so so nas shas cher sgom pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gzhig go snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa dag ngoms par

bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun par slob par 'dod pa dang / grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o/ /rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum

gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa sha stag dang / go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems

can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar shin tu rings par gcig la gcig 'jus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ yam sreg shing dge bsnyen pha rnams kyi nyis 'gyur khyer ba las bcom

ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ bu shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ ngus nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lid tsa bI gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po la sogs pa yangs pa can na gnas pa'i lid

tsa bI gzhon nu grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i rgyal phran blon po dang bcas pa gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos bsrung ba la mkhas pa/ tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon

tan dang ldan pa/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag la/ de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta bur 'dod de/ bdag cag gi nor dang / 'bru'i tshogs dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams

cad ni bdud rtsi mi zad par bya ba dang / bdud rtsi gnas par bya ba'i phyir yin gyis/ bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos la sun 'byin cing log par lta ba rnams kyi lce gcad par bya'o zhes legs par dam bcas pa/

tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims la mi gnas pa rnams ni gos dkar po gyon du bcug ste/ khyim pa'i las byed du gzhug go snyam du sems brtul ba/ dam pa'i chos stug pa la ni bla ma bzhin du rim gro bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ dge 'dun la phan pa dang bde

bar gnas par bya ba'i yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang / des chog go snyam du sems pa dang / theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du yi dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang / de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag

tu med pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ lid tsa bI gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sgrib pa dag pa zhes bya ba dang / gang gA'i chu dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa lid tsa bI gzhon nu de dag kyang gcig

la gcig 'jus te/ re res kyang gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i bud shing thang shing gi mchog dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru rnams dang / yam sreg shing bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur rnams khyer nas mchod pa rnams bsgrags te/ bcom

ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo / /lid tsa bI gzhon nu re re la yang glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / nor bu chu shel brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so/ /glang po che re re'i mdun du yang / che ba la 'os pa'i gdugs

dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi bla re chen po rnams thogs so/ /gdugs rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang / kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod do/ /dar gyi bla re chen po rnams kyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pa de la yang chu zheng du dpag

tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do/ /rgyal mtshan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod do/ /ba dan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa des kyang dpag tshad stong du phyin to/ /de ltar de dag mchod pa rnams dang bcas te bcom ldan

'das kyi thad du dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas phul ba las bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ste/ ma bzhes nas mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun

gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling pa'i blon po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la dad pa/ tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/

dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag gi rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang / 'gro ba skyong zhes bya ba dang / chos skyong zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa dag kyang de'i tshe der lhags te/ de

dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi mchod pas mchod pa snga ma rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod nas zhal zas ma bzhes pa'i phyir/ mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te bcom ldan

'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs par yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'dzam

bu gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang / ri khrod kyi grong dang / yul po che dang / kha lungs kyi rgyal po gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so/ /rgyal po de rnams re re la yang dmag 'khrug sa ya phrag brgyad

brgyad yod do/ /de dag la glang po che rtag tu 'gram pa nas rngul 'dzag pa dag dang / rta rlung gi shugs pas lhag par mgyogs pa dag kyang yod do/ /de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad gang yin pa de dag kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma de dag las nyis

'gyur gyis ches bzang la ches mang ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i phul dag khyer nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so/ /de dag gi mchod pa de rnams kyi nang na gdugs thung ngu gang yin pa de yang dpag tshad brgyad cu chu zheng gab par 'dug

go/ /ba dan gyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pas kyang dpag tshad brgya stong du phyin to/ /rgyal mtshan phal pa gang yin pa de la yang 'phang du dpag tshad sum cu yod do/ /de ltar yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / nyi 'od ces bya ba dang / de

la sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'char kar lhags te/ de dag kyang dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ mthus kyang sems can rnams dam pa'i chos la 'god par byed pa dang / bdag cag gi nor dang / 'bru'i

tshogs dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi lce ni drung nas gcad do zhes dam

bcas pa brtan por byas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse ba sha stag ste/ de dag gi mchod pa rnams kyis yangs pa can nas grong khyer ku shi'i bar thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to/ /de dag gi gdugs kyi grib

ma 'dab chags su 'dug pas ni nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi phog go/ /de dag gi kha zas kyi dri bsung gis ni dpag tshad bzhir khyab par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gis sbyar ba'i zhal zas bzhes par lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba btab kyang / zhal zas ma

bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo ma gtogs par yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma la sogs pa 'dzam bu gling pa'i rgyal po dang /

tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi chung ma gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can mang po nges par sgrol ba/ rtag tu lus bsgom pa dang ldan pa/ chen po stong pa nyid

dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas sems rnam par dag pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo pri yang ku zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang

sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ gcig la gcig 'jus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ mchod pa snga ma thams cad rang rang gi

mchod pa rnams kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nyis 'gyur du mchod pa byas te/ de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs rnams kyi 'phang dang chu zheng gi tshad kyang snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag go/ /kha zas

rnams kyi dri bsung ni dpag tshad brgyad du khyab par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skor ba byed cing skra 'bal la rang rang gi rgyan rnams 'thor zhing / skad mi snyan

pas ngus te bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sA la zung gi drung nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mig yangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha'i tshogs gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dang

lhan cig tu lhags nas/ lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag ltos/ grogs po dag ltos/ mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog tu khyad par du 'phags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkur sti thams cad mchod par 'dod de/ mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi tha ma bzhes pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs kyis/ grogs po dag bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya zhing tha ma'i dus su zhal zas dbul bar bya na/ ji ltar bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad cig gu/

grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon no/ /de bas kyang zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni ches dkon no/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ni 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /

lha de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan to snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen pos skom pa ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa rnams ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg

pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ theg pa chen po la phrag dog dang / dus che ba dang / 'chab pa dang / sgyu med pa/ theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i tshul khrims blangs pa/ 'jig rten dang 'thun

par slob par 'dod pa/ bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o/ /bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/

bslab pa rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la snying rjes lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gdung zhugs la

bzhen pa'i phyir/ bud shing dang / yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ de dag kyang snga mas phul ba'i yam sreg shing gi nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba'i lha rdzas dri bsung dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ mi la dkon pa sha stag go/ /shing rta yang rta'i mchog mgyogs pa

dag dang sbyar ba/ dar la dkar pos g.yogs pa/ gzugs dang dbyibs ri mo brir yang mi nus pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can gyi yol bas bskor ba/ dar yug khyim chen po'i bla re rgya chen po rtsa ba ri mo can dag la btsugs pa dang / gar thabs dang / rol

mo yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mdun du drangs pa/ kha zas zhim po mang po dag dang / seng ge'i khri bai dUr+ya'i rgyab rten rtse mo nor bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ zhabs rten gser las byas pa dag kyang bshams pa dang / sa phyogs kyang me tog dri bsung zhim po sna tshogs

kyis mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bkod pa/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi phyi bzhin 'brang ba sha stag ste/ so so nas mchi ma khrag lta bu mi thub cing mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdungs nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /

bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ bcom

ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mchod pa dang bkur sti'i mchog rnam pa mang po dag byas te bskor ba yang byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams kyi phyir rang rang gi bla gos sa la bting ste/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams phog cing gtor nas rang rang

gi skra 'bal cing skad mi snyan pas ngu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol/ zhes lan gnyis

lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes te cang mi gsung nas/ de dag re thag chad de langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhi na gnas pa klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la sogs pa

klu'i rgyal po gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed shin tu rings par nyi ma 'char kar lha rnams kyi mchod pa las kyang nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rang rang gi 'byor pa dang 'tsham pa dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas bzhes

par gsol ba btab kyang bsam pa bzhin du ma grub nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/ gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed gcig la gcig 'jus nas/

rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchod pa snga ma zil gyis mnan nas/ tshogs chen po dang chas te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas

yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dgra'i mdza' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gang gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyis/ rang rang gi mchod pas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po snga ma dag gi

mchod pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe dri za'i bdag po mis

byin gyi bu la sogs pa dri za'i bdag po gang gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma thams cad pas kyang ches mchog tu gyur pa'i mchod pa rnams khyer te 'ongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ rol mo snyan dgu byas nas phyag 'tshal

te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas/ de dag kyang yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe mi 'am ci'i bdag po legs mthong

la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i bdag po gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed lhags te/ snga ma rnams kyi mchod pa de dag bsdoms pa bas kyang de dag re re'i mchod pa ches khyad par 'phags par gyur te/ de dag kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ yid mi dga' bar gyur

te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po legs mthong chen po la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur khyer ba las/ snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas/

yid mi dga' ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bdag po bde mchog rigs la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bdag po gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa/ lha ma yin gyi bsam pa med pa sha stag gis/

mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dag khyer te 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas ma bzhes te yid mi dga' bar gyur nas/ langs te shing sA la zung gi drung du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis snang bar byas te 'khod do/ /gzhan

yang de'i tshe sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bdag po gang gA'i chu dri ma med pa rjes byin la sogs pa sbyin byed ma'i bu gang gA'i klung bdun cu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa/ sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga ma thams cad las mchod pa nyis 'gyur nyis

'gyur bas bzang ba dag khyer ba las/ snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ shing sA la zung gi bar du rang rang gi gzi brjid kyis snang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe srin po'i

bdag po 'jigs byed la sogs pa srin po'i bdag po gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed srin po'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis gzi brjid chen po'i tshogs kyis sA la zung gi drung du snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu

'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po dri srel la sogs pa 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po gang gA'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis snga ma'i mchod pa thams cad pas nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis lhag pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs khyer nas/ khu byug

pho rgyags pa rnams dang / bung ba rnams skad 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i me tog 'tsher ba'i 'khri shing mang po'i dog pa dang / lo ma kha 'bus pa rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po

sgyu 'phrul chen po la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mo 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can

legs mthong ma la sogs pa gang gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed kyis yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchod pa nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer te/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la spungs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang

de'i tshe lha'i bu mo ram b+ha dang / urba shi la sogs pa lha'i bu mo gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas ches lhag par mang zhing spa ba dag gis mdun du drangs te/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i

tshe 'byung po'i tshogs pa ba sangs ltar 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag stong gi bye ma snyed snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i lha'i bu gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu mchod pa

snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rlung lha bzhi

rlung gtong ba'i lha gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu dus ma yin par yang shing ljon pa dang / 'khri shing dang / shing gel pa dang / nags ma rnams dang / snye ma dang / me tog gi 'khri shing dang / byi ru rnams kyis sa phyogs rgyan par byed cing / dus

tshigs thams cad kyi me tog gi dpal rnams phyogs su rgyas par byed la/ lo ma kha 'bus pa/ rtsa ba dmar ba rnams kyis shing sA la zung nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer ser po ja hong khar 'dug pa bzhin du byas nas/ mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod

pa dag khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ snga ma bzhin du shing sA la zung gi drung du 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe char pa 'bebs pa'i lha gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sprin chen po dang / chu skyar rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing glog 'gyu ba'i gseb nas

rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mdog sngo ba'i char gyi rgyun 'bab la/ 'brug sgra dal nas sgrogs pa'i sprin dang ldan pas char zim bu bsil ba dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas re thag chad de/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i me bsad pa'i phyir nam mkha' nyid la 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po sgra gcan dang / lung tang mdog dang / sbrang rtsi mdog sel dang / 'dod dgu'i spos ldan la sogs pa spos kyi glang po gang gA'i klung nyi shu'i

bye ma snyed theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir gangs kyi sman dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu shing rta chen po'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag dang / dgon pa chen po dag nas pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku

mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang / rdo gu tha dad pa du ma dag sna'i thor tos phyung zhing phyung zhing khyer te/ rlung gi shugs pas kyang ches mgyogs pa dang / shin tu rings par dbyar gyi 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrogs shing lhags nas/ pad+ma'i

'dab ma bcer ba'i seng ge'i khri'i lda ldi dag bshams te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas re thag chad de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa seng ge gang gA'i klung

sum cu'i bye ma snyed sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sha stag gis/ seng ge'i rtsal chen pos spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te/ rings par lhags nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe bya

ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / ka dam pa dang / zal mo dang / bzhad dang / khu byug dang / ba li ka dang / ka la ping ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pas kyang spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu khyer te/ rang rang

gi skad phyung nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe sa'i steng na ba dang / ma he mo dang / ra ma mo yod do cog gis kyang nu ma 'o mas bkang ste/ shin tu rings par lhags nas/ shing sA la zung gi drung nas phyogs gshong zhig mthong nas/ der rang

rang gi nu ma 'o mas gang ba de dag las 'o ma gseg ma dang / bye ma dang / ba tshas ma 'bags shing tsha ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag gzags te/ 'o ma de dag gi nang nas sbrang bu dag bsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe drang srong bzod par smra ba la

sogs pa gling bzhi na gnas pa'i drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag la/ gang gA'i klung dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yam sreg shing dang / zhal zas dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan

'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun kha cig dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo la sogs pa ma gtogs par yul phyogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma

ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par der lhags so/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe ri rab la sogs pa ri chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi bar mtshams kyi ri gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed kyang shing ljon pa dang / 'khri shing mang po nyi tshan gyi grib

ma byed pa dang / brag zang yag grib ma che ba dang / brag kha nas 'bab pa'i chus gang ba dang / sman gshong rdo gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bus gang ba dag kyang der lhags so/ /lha'i bu mthu bo che'i 'dun ma chen po dag kyang ri rab dang bcas te mchod pa'i

phyir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mthu bo che 'od chen po rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i nang na gnas pa dang / chu klung chen po dag gi nang na gnas pa gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed mchod pa snga ma

bas ches nyis 'gyur gyis mdzes pa'i mchod pa sngon du btang nas/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis mar me'i 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis mnan te/ nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od kyis shing mya ngan 'tshang gi lo ma thams cad dmar lam mer

snang bar byed pa/ de bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis chu klung gser ldan gyi chu dmar lam mer snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe grong khyer ku shi nas shing sA la zung gi drung gi bar skabs kyi bar

snang la khang ri'i dbang po'i rtse mo lta bu/ ngang pa'i thal gong ltar dkar ba sha stag gis 'khrigs par gyur to/ /sa gzhi ni skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu'i chu pad mas mdzes par byas pa dag gis gang bar 'dug ste/ byang

gi sgra mi snyan gyi skyed mos tshal bas kyang lhag par mdzes so/ /gcig tu na dga' ba'i tshal dang / shing rta sna tshogs can dang 'dra bar gyur te/ sa phyogs de dag de ltar dga' dga' ltar 'dug kyang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi de dag de bzhin

gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir shin tu ngu'o/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams rang rang gi 'khor la 'di skad ces zer to/ /grogs po dag ltos/ grogs po dag ltos/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi rnams kyi

de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las khyad par du 'phags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul ba la brtson gyis/ grogs po dag bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas

mchod pa bya'o/ /zhal zas kyi tha ma yang dbul bar bya'o/ /gal te bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes par gyur na/ de las bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis de

skad ces smras nas/ g.yog 'khor mang po grangs med pa dang bcas pas mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dang zhal zas mang po dag khyer ro/ /me tog mang po dag kyang khyer te/ 'di lta ste/ man dA ra ba rnams dang / man dA ra ba chen po rnams dang / ke

ke ru ka rnams dang / ke ke ru ka chen po rnams dang / man dzu Sha ka rnams dang / man dzu Sha ka chen po rnams dang / san ta na ga rnams dang / san ta na ga chen po rnams dang / 'od can rnams dang / 'od can chen po rnams dang / kun tu 'od can rnams dang / 'od

mtha' yas pa rnams dang / mdzes sdug rnams dang / mdzes sdug chen po rnams dang / dga' byed rnams dang / dga' byed chen po rnams dang / dri mchog rnams dang / dri mchog chen po rnams dang / spos kyi ngad ldang rnams dang / spos

kyi ngad ldang chen po rnams dang / kun tu ngad ldang rnams dang / kun tu ngad ldang chen po rnams dang / mtha' yas ngad ldang rnams dang / mtha' yas ngad ldang chen po rnams dang / lha rdzas kyi 'dab ma rnams dang / klung gi me tog rnams dang / yongs 'du

sa brtol rnams dang / de lta bu gzhan dag kyang khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ nyi ma'i gzi byin gyis srin bu me khyer gyi 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis mnan te/ zhal zas ma bzhes

nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ mchod pa snga ma de'i nyis 'gyur de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa de na yod pa'i me tog gi sna grangs du ma yid du 'ong ba rnams dang / yid

du 'ong ba chen po rnams dang / dri bsung zhim po rnams khyer ro/ /khang chen po rdo thal gyi mdog ltar dkar ba/ them skas kyi rim pa dang ldan pa/ skar khung gi phreng ba du ma phug ron shug rtse ba dang ldan pa dag kyang sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba

der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde tshan srung ba
lags na/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/ de skad ces gsol kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// //bam po gnyis pa/

de'i rjes la mthar gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la mchod pa dang / 'od snga ma las khyad par du spags nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ de dag gi mchod pa'i nang na gdugs phal

pa gang yin pa de yang kho ra khor yug tu gling bzhi pa'i khyon tsam mo/ /ba dan phal pa gang yin pa de yang rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i mthar thug ste/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho nas nub phyogs kyi rgya mtshor thug ste/ rlung gis bskyod dam/ rlung gis phyar na ba dan de dag

las pi bang gi sgra snyan pa khong nas 'khyil pa lta bur snyan pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung nas re thag chad de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i

tshe srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams ma gtogs par gong ma gong ma'i sems can gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ mchod pa rgya chen po'i tshogs dang chas te lhags nas snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /mi

mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ rang gi gzi byin gyis lha thams cad kyi gzi byin zil gyis mnan nas/ mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang chas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ de

dag gi ba dan phal pa gang yin pa de yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'phyang ste/ shing sA la zung gi drung du thug go/ /des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /

de nas de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi g.yog 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas/ tshangs pa dang dbang po gnyis ma gtogs par de'i bar gyi lha yod do cog gi 'od rang gi 'od kyis mog mog por byas nas/ de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i

mchod pa'i tshogs dang / rkyen du 'tsham pa'i zhal zas dag dang chas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo / /de'i gdugs phal pa yang chu zheng du 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngu khyab pa tsam ste/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par

gsol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bdud sdig can chung ma grangs med pa'i 'khor dang chas te/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi bar srang thams cad phye nas/ de dag la chu dang / kha

zas la sogs pa ci 'dod pa byin te/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis shig /sbyin pa'i tha ma la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig ces smras nas/ de dag la khyed bde bar gyur cig ces kyang dbugs

phyung ngo / /sems can dmyal ba'i grong khyer mtshon chas gang zhing me chen po 'bar ba rnams su yang sprin chen po bzhin du chu chen po phab nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus

bdud kyi sems kyi gnas skabs de lta bur gyur to/ /de'i 'khor gang yin pa de dag gis kyang gzhu dang / ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mtshon kam pa na dang / lcags kyi ber ka dang / lcags mda' dang / sha ta

ka ni ha dang / mda' dang / 'phang mdung dang / mdung rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha rnam pa du ma yongs su spangs te chos lhur len par gyur to/ /de'i mchod pa yang lha snga ma rnams la med pa de lta bur gyur te/ de'i gdugs phal pa'i chu zheng du yang 'jig rten

gyi khams bar ma'i khyon tsam mo/ /de ltar de mthu chen po dang ldan zhing rang gi chung ma rnams kyi rnga yab kyis g.yob bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pas bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis da slan chad theg pa chen po'i slad du yi dam bca' bar

'tshal te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung / 'jigs pa'i slad du 'am/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba'i slad du 'am/ thob tu re ba'i slad du 'am/ gzhan gyis bgyid du stsal ba 'am/ gzhan gyi yid bsrung ba'i slad du

yang rung ste/ theg pa chen po rjod par bgyid na/ de'i don du 'jigs pa dang / mi dga' ba thams cad bsal ba'i gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ Thag ke /Ta Ta ra Thag ke /ro ru re/ ma hA ro ru re/ A la mA la/ tA la/ swA hA/

chos smra ba 'khrul pa dang 'jigs pas gnod par gyur pa rnams/ chos kyi tshul la spobs pa bskyed par bgyi ba dang / mu stegs pa rnams myos par bgyi ba dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i slad du bdag gis rang gi

dam tshig gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di glang po che'i 'jigs pa 'am/ nags khung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ chu klung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ me'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du bsrung ba'i gzungs sngags kyi don du rjod pa gang lags pa de dag ni rjod pa

tsam gyis ji ltar ru sbal rang gi lus bsrungs pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis g.yo dang sgyu ma mchis par de dag gi 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi/ stobs dang ldan par yang bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da zhal zas 'di bzhes

par gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sdig can khyod kha zas kyi phyir gsol ba ma 'debs shig /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir chos kyi sbyin par

'gyur bas na bzhes par bya'i/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin gyis/ sdig can khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang bdud dang bdud kyi

bu mo rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa las ma bzhes te/ re thag chad nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dpag tu med pa mthu dpag tu med pa dag gis mdun du bdar te/ rang gi 'od

kyis tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin dang / bdud kyi 'od rnams snag tsha'i gong bu bzhin du 'od mi gsal bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa rgya chen po nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas der song ste/ de'i mchod pa

rnams kyi nang na gdugs phal pa gang yin pa de yang chu zheng du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'dug ste/ mchod pa de lta bu sngon du btang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin te/ lan du mar bskor ba byas nas zhabs la

mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la bdag mchod pa bgyid pa ni sbrang bu mchod pa bgyid pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag sbrang bu dang

'dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa'i rngo ga la thogs kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du zhal zas kyi tha ma gsol bar ci gnang zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang / lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom

ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung grangs med pa gtams phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/

'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog sgra snyan mu tug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des sras kyi thu bo nyan thos lus

chen mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'

bar 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas zhal zas zhim po phan pa dag khyer te song shig /mchod pa chen po dag kyang khyer te song la/ de la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas

'di gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes gyis shig /khyod kyi the tshom dang yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na la legs par zhus shig dang / des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur ro

zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas des/ legs so/ /legs so zhes gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen po grangs med pas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab

tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor rab tu 'khor/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig /mer mer rab tu mer mer/ ldem ldem rab tu ldem ldem mo/ /de la sogs pa byas te/ sa chen po rab tu g.yos so/ /

de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / lha ma yin dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams kyis sa gzhi de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas skyi bung zhes byas te/ 'jigs shing kha dang lkog ma skams nas/

'bros par chas te rang rang gi 'od kyang mi mthong zhing 'od nyams par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs te/ lha'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig /ma

'jigs shig /shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung grangs med pa gtams phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog sgra snyan mu tug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des rang gi sras kyi thu bo nyan thos la bos te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mi

mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi

tha ma phul la/ khyod kyi the tshom dang yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dag kyang legs par zhus shig dang / des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha'

yas 'di btang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'dir 'ongs pa de'i gzi brjid kyis khyod kyi 'od nyams par gyur to/ /de 'ong ba la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam

pas bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa mdzad pa la yang ltos shig ces byas so/ /de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis me long gi ngos la bdag gi gzugs mthong ba bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thag ring po na

bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de mthong ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ji ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'di

mthong ba de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang ltos shig /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'di ltar bdag nyid che ba yin te/ rang rang gi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du yang khyed la

zhal ston par mdzad do/ /'khor de dag gis smras pa/ kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bdag nyid che ba yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba lta/ kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor ba yang mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu re re nas pad ma chen po byung ngo / /pad ma chen po re re la yang grong khyer bdun khri brgyad stong bdun khri brgyad stong yod la

grong khyer de dag kyang yul yangs pa can gyi thag gru tsam sha stag ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba dang 'obs bdun rim gyis bskor la/ shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun rim gyis mdzes par byas pa sha stag ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang ldan zhing

dga' dga' ltar 'dug la/ ra ba de dag kyang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi ba gam chen po sha stag gis bskor te/ ba gam thams cad kyi bar bar na yang shing ljon pa gzhon sha can 'bras bu dang me tog dang ldan pa sna mang po dag yod do/ /shing ljon pa de dag

gi yal ga rlung gis bskyod pa las kyang sil snyan dga' bar byed pa'i sgra snyan cing chags su rung ba 'byung ba sna lnga lnga sgrogs te/ sgra de dag gis sems can de dag rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /'obs de dag thams cad kyang chu bsil zhing shel

bzhin du dang ba dag gis gang bar 'dug ste/ de dag gi nang kho ra khor yug tu sems can de dag rin po che'i gru dag gis dga' zhing rgyu bar byed do/ /chu de dag kyang pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu da shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag gis brgyan to/ /

'obs kyi kho ra khor yug kyang skyed mos tshal gyi phreng bas mdzes par byas te/ skyed mos tshal re re la yang rdzing bu thag gru dpag tshad phyed pa lnga lnga yod do/ /rdzing bu'i chu de dag kyang pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu da kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim po shing rta'i

'phang lo tsam sha stag gis khebs par 'dug la/ shing ljon pa me tog rgyas pa'i phreng bas mdzes par byas so/ /skyed mos tshal kho ra khor yug na yang ngang ngur dang / zal mo dang / khrung khrung shug dag gis pad ma'i ze 'bru myong bar byed do/ /kho ra

khor yug gi skyed mos tshal de dang de dag na yang khang khyim dag yod la/ khang pa re re la yang chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi bzhi yod de/ rtsig pa ni gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas/ sa gzhi ni ke ke ru las grub pa ste/ nor bu'i

'jo tshar gyis spel cing snang bar byas pa'i mu tig gi do shal spyangs pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi rta babs chen po dang / skar khung dang / dra ba dag gis brgyan pa'i khang mthon po sa gzhi ni gser gyi bye ma bdal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /rdzing bu rnams

kyang 'drul ba'i lam gser gyi them skas them pa brgyad dang ldan pa dang / mtha' thog thag tu gser gyi chu shing gi phreng bas mdzes par byas pa'i lha'i tsan dan gyi dri bsung can gyi chu dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /grong khyer chen po de dag re re'i nang na yang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong

brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /sems can gzhan dag

kyang de dang 'dra ste/ sa phyogs ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa/ me tog gi sil mas gtor ba/ gzhan dag na rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /grong khyer chen po dag na theg pa chen po'i sgra ma

gtogs par theg pa gzhan gyi sgra med do/ /pad ma chen po de dag la yang seng ge'i khri chen po rkang pa gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa/ ka ling ka'i ras kyis g.yogs pa/ che ba la 'os pa/ 'jig rten gsum na phul

du bya ba sha stag gis dkris te/ seng ge'i khri de dag la rgyal po de dag 'khod cing sems can gzhan dag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams slob par byed de/ rgyal po de dag gi mdun na la la ni yi ge 'dri/ la la ni klog /la la ni kha ton slob bo/ /

de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi ba spu'i khung bu nas skyes pa'i pad ma dag la 'khod pa'i sems can de dag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang ldan yang / de dag yongs su spangs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te smre sngags

'don cing / kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod de/ nyis 'gyur du mchod pa'i tshogs 'bul bar byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pas bskor te/ de lta bu'i 'byor pa'i rnam pa

dag ston cing mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang / zhal zas ches rgya che ba dag khyer te 'ongs nas/ zhal zas de dag dang / pad ma de dag gi dri bsung tshor ba gang yin pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten

gyi khams thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi lus kyi tshad kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'dug ste/ sus kyang mthong bar mi nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po lus chen mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi

gsung bar gyur te/ lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol kyang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs logs nas kyang

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang ldan pa sha stag lhags te/ de dag gi pad ma dang / grong khyer gyi tshad kyang snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba dang / 'byor pa nyis 'gyur nyis

'gyur gyis che ba sha stag dang chas te/ de dag der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la pad ma dag gis mchod pa byas te snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /shing sA la zung gi drung grub pa'i gnas de nyid na dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad kyi khyon

gyi sa gzhi la/ sems can mi 'khod pa'i go skabs ci yang med do/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lus che ba rang rang gi g.yog 'khor dag dang bcas pa de rnams kyang / kha cig ni sa phyogs smyung bu'i rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do/ /

kha cig ni khab kyi rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do/ /kha cig ni rdul phra rab kyi khyon tsam la bag yangs su 'khod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thabs de lta bur lhags te 'khod do/

'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can yang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra rnams ma gtogs par der ma 'ongs pa su yang med de/ tha na mi gdug pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / sdig pa

dang / sdom la sogs pa las mi bzad pa bcu drug byed pa yan chad kyang der lhags so/ /sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / lha ma yin rtag tu 'khon gyi bsam pa can thams cad kyang sdig pa'i las spangs nas gcig la gcig bu dang / ma dang / sring mo dang 'dra bar

sems par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du byams par byed de/ 'dod chen po ni ma gtogs so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang de

bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bong ba dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / rdu ba dang / tsher ma med par gyur te/ shing ljon pa rin po che'i 'khri shing gis dkris pa/ mnyen zhing reg na 'jam pa dag dang ldan zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang 'dra bar gyur

to/ /sems can der lhags pa thams cad kyis kyang de na 'khod bzhin du/ ji ltar me long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa gzhan dag kyang

mthong ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang / me lce lta bu dag byung ba gang yin pa de dag gis bya ba gang yin pa de dag gi bya

ba thams cad byas te phyir log nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal du zhugs te mi snang bar gyur to/ /'khor thams cad kyi 'od kyang des zil gyis gnon par gyur to/ /de nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'od zer de dag bcom

ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa mthong nas/ 'jigs shing skyi bung zhes byas te/ rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer rnams phyir log nas mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i mi rigs na/ gor ma chag par phyogs bcu dag tu bya ba rnams zin nas da ni

gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las kyang zhal zas ma bzhes na/ kye ma sems can thams cad la tshad med pa bzhi spangs sam/ ci smyung bar bzhugs par chad dam/

kye ma ci nyi ma dang zla ba nub bam/ ci dam pa'i chos kyi gru bying ngam/ kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod do/ /de nas de dag rang rang gi yan lag rnams rmas par byas pa'i khrag gis sa gzhi 'dam du gyur to/ /chu klung gser ldan yang khrag tu 'bab

par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na grong khyer ku shi pa mgar ba'i bu dge bsnyen skul byed ces bya ba de mgar ba'i bu lnga dang thabs cig tu langs te/ rang rang gi spyod lam bcos nas 'jig rten dag la bltas te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu

gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ mchi ma mi thub bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

bdag ni sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul bar 'tshal te/ bdag ni mgon ma

mchis pa lags/ rtsa lag ma mchis pa lags/ skyabs ma mchis pa lags/ phongs te re ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes te/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das

dper gsol na khyim bdag gam bram ze shin tu dbul po 'ga' zhig gzhan gyi yul du mchis la/ bdag nyid spro ba bskyed de mthar gyis zhing las brtsams nas/ des rmon glang rmo skyen pa thong gshol dang sbyar ba dag gis zhing la rdo dang /

rdu ba dang / tsher ma ma mchis par bgyis te/ re ba chen po bskyed nas sprin chen po las char 'bab pa sdod cing mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus kyi zhing la nyes pa gsum dang / bzhi dang bral ba'i yid dang ngag gi rmon glang dang shes pa'i thong

gshol gyis nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdo dang / rdu ba dang / tsher ma ma mchis par bgyis nas/ khyod kyi chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char pa 'bab pa la sdod cing mchis te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par spyan 'dren na/ bdag gi dbul ba bsal

ba dang / sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/ bdag ni mgon ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs par gsol/

de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal ba gang zag bla na med pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi zhal zas tha ma sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po bzhes par mdzad do/ /de nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin de dag gis skul byed kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bzhes so zhes

thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos thob ste/ legs so legs so zhes skad chen po phyung nas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod skyid de ba khyod kyis mi lus thob pa ni phan thogs par gyur to/ /legs par thob

bo/ /skul byed 'jig rten na u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin du mdzes pa ni rnyed par dka'o/ /de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /de bas kyang dad pa rnyed pa shin tu dka'o/ /de bas kyang ches chos thos pa rnyed par dka'o/ /de

bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul ba rnyed par dka'o/ /de bas na zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dper na ston zla 'bring po nya la sprin med pa'i tshe zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

dri ma med pa mdzes pa mthong ba na zla ba 'ba' zhig mngon du snang ba de bzhin du/ khyod kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pas na khyod 'ba' zhig sems can thams cad la mngon du snang ngo / /khyod la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo/ /

skul byed khyod ni mi'i lus byed bzhin du lha'i yang lha yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras sgra gcan zin dang 'dra'o zhes byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /khyod ni mi ma yin te lha mchog yin/ /mi mchog gtso bo khyad par 'phags

pa ste/ /de phyir khyod la gsol ba 'di skad 'debs/ /ston pa yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar chas/ /bdag cag kun la brtse bas skul byed khyod/ /skye bo rnams la yun du phan pa'i phyir/ /'dir ni ston pa dpag med mgon po la/ /bzhugs shing rgyun du

bdud rtsi ston ces gsol/ /srid las rnam grol mya ngan 'da' bzhed la/ /gal te khyod kyis de ring ma gsol na/ /bdag cag thams cad ma rung shes par gyis/ /de bas phan phyir mgon la gsol ba thob/ /de nas la la zhig pha ma gnyis shi ba las

phyir sos te gson por 'dug pa mthong na mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa de kho na bzhin du mgar ba'i bu skul byed de mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas lag pa brkyang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas langs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /

kye ma deng bdag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /mi yi 'jig rten skyes pa 'bras bu yod/ /da ni rnyed la sogs las 'bral mi 'gyur/ /mi bzad dmyal bar yang ni ltung mi 'gyur/ /deng 'dir rnyed pa chen po rnyed pa 'di/ /gser gyi phung po

bas kyang lhag pa yin/ /dpa' bo bde gshegs mgon dang phrad pas na/ /phyin chad bdag ni dud 'gro'i 'jigs pa med/ /sangs rgyas la ni dad pa gting zug pa/ /deng rnyed u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /rab 'jigs 'gro ba yongs

spangs shing / /lha min skye ba'i sa bon mi bzad bcom/ /de bzhin gshegs 'byung dkon dang deng phrad pa/ /khab kyi rtse mor yungs 'bru chags pa bzhin/ /de la pha rol phyin mchog sbyin phul bas/ /rtag tu lha yi 'gro bar 'phar bar gyur/ /chu gnas

pad ma chus mi chags pa ltar/ /drang srong chen po 'jig rten chos rnams kyis/ /chags med phrad pas srid rtse'i sa bon kun/ /drungs phyung bdag nyid 'khor ba'i mtsho chen rgal/ /rgya mtsho'i nang gi ru sbal zhar ba'i mgrin/ /gnya' shing mig tu chud dka'

'dra ba las/ /bde gshegs deng phrad de la sbyin pa phul/ /de na bdag gis nyon mongs gsog kun bcom/ /lha rnams kyis ni zhal zas bzang po dag /phul yang bde gshegs ma bzhes bdag las ni/ /e raN+Da yi me tog 'dra bzhes des/ /

bdag ni 'jig rten rab mchog dpal yon can/ /tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs 'jig rten 'di/ /thams cad lhags te gus par bdag la mchod/ /khyu mchog gnas su son pa gang yin 'di/ /skye ba 'di nyid la ni bdag gis thob/ /de nas thal mo

sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mgon khyod mya ngan 'da' ba mthong nas ni/ /'jig rten 'di kun sdug bsngal gzir bar gyur/ /dbang med kyi hud ces ni skad cher bla/ /'di dag ma dor rtag tu sras bzhin gzigs/ /lhun po'i gser gyi

rtse mo rab mtho ba/ /mtsho chen dbus na mdzes par gnas pa ltar/ /chos kyi mnga' bdag khyod ni chos ston cing / /dge 'dun dbus su mdzes par bzhugs su gsol/ /ji ltar nyi ma gzi can shar ba na/ /'od zer dag gis sprin srab sel ba ltar/ /

drang srong chen po ye shes sgron chen gyis/ /skye bo mang po'i mya ngan deng bsal mdzod/ /sems can 'di dag ngud mos mig skrangs shing / /sdug bsngal gcig pu'i rgya mtsho'i gting du zhugs/ /de phyir dad pa rnyed dka' skyed mdzad cing / /'di rnams sdug

bsngal chod la yun du bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la bka' stsal pa/ skul byed de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /dad pa yang rnyed par dka'o/ /chos

thos pa yang rnyed par dka'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed par dka'o/ /skul byed gzhan yang khyod ma ngu mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis de bzhin

gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa thob bo snyam du dga' ba skyed cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad du khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos

kyi de kho na nyid la rtogs shig /mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug par gyis shig /'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /tshe ni shin tu ring yang 'jig par 'gyur/ /'dir ni thams cad

nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ /'byor pa thams cad rgud par gzhol bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu lang tsho rga bas nges par 'joms/ /gzugs bzang nad med nad kyis 'jig par 'gyur/ /srog ni 'chi bas rtsa nas

'byin par byed/ /'jig rten kun na rtag pa ci yang med/ /dbang phyug mi rtag tshe yang mi rtag ste/ /skye bo sdug bsngal 'khor lor rtag tu 'khor/ /'jig rten gsum na brtan po ci yang med/ /srid pa dag na 'gro kun srog tu 'dug /

srid pa 'jig pa'i chos can rab g.yo ba/ /'di dag na ni bde ba ci yang med/ /rga dang 'chi dang nad dang rgud rnams kyi/ /'jigs pas rtag tu kun nas gtse bar byed/ /srid pa mtha' med mi brtan snying po med/ /thams cad dgra dang 'khu bar shes par

gyis/ /de na 'khor zhing nyon mongs dra ba yis/ /'jig rten dkris te dar gyi srin bu bzhin/ /'jig rten dag na ther zug gnod pa'i gzhi/ /rtag tu 'bras ltar sdug bsngal 'brel pa gang / /mi gtsang lus dang 'dod pa de dag la/ /phan 'dod sdug bsngal

bsal 'dod su zhig dga'/ /mi rtag 'dod pa rnams la chags pa med/ /tshul bzhin rtog pas 'dod chags 'bral bar 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag mthong na 'dod chags 'bral/ /de dag spangs bcad grol ba nyid du 'gyur/ /nga ni srid pa'i chu chen legs

par rgal/ /nga ni sdug bsngal rnams 'das bde bar zhugs/ /de phyir ngas ni mtha' yas spros med pa/ /chags pa kun bsal thar pa thob par gyur/ /nga la rga dang na dang 'chi ba med/ /nga la rtag tu tshe yang zad pa med/ /nga ni me ltar 'bar te 'gro

'gyur gyis/ /khyod kyis nga ni med 'gyur ma sems shig /de bzhin gshegs nyid lhun po 'dra bar ltos/ /nga deng yang dag mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /bde mchog de ni nga yis chos nyid de/ /rgyal rnams spyod yul yin gyis khyod ma ngu / /de nas bcom

ldan 'das la mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni de lags so/ /de ni de lags te/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gis kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags na/ sbrang bu dang 'dra ba'i sems can theg pa dman pa

gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag deng du byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog skal ba chen po dang ldan pa/ mchod par 'os pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa dang / zag pa zad pa rnams dang mnyam pa

nyid du gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ gsar du bsnyen par rdzogs pa gzhon nu yang rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi nyin par nas dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun du bgrang zhing yang dag par 'dus par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang de bzhin

gshegs pa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi grangs su gtogs shing yang dag par 'dus lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/ kha zas tshig pa bzhin du mya ngan las

'da' bar gshegs par ni mi 'tshal lags so/ /de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skul byed khyod 'di skad du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/ kha zas tshig

pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par ni mi 'tshal lo zhes de skad ma zer cig /'du byed kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya mod/ de ltar lta ba gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos 'dod pas ni de ltar bslab

par bya'o/ /skul byed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal 'o na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lha mchog tu gyur pa la gal te 'du byed du gyur na lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no/ /'du byed rnams ni chu bur bzhin du shes shing shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin

du 'khor ba yin no/ /lha rnams ni mchog tu tshe ring zhes grags la/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni lo brgya yang ma thub ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no/ /dper na mi la la zhig grong dpon byed pa las de mthar gyis dbang

phyug chen por gyur nas blon po chen po'i dbang phyug las kyang 'das te/ rang gi dbang phyug gi 'bras bu chos kyis rnyed pa la longs spyod pa las/ de phyir yang bsod nams zad cing dbang phyug las nyams par gyur na/ gzhan gyis

bkol zhing brnyas par 'gyur ba de/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbul por gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de dang 'dra bar gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur du zin na/ 'chi ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa 'jam dpal de bas na

lha'i yang lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la de ltar 'du byed dang 'dra bar ma lta shig /'jam dpal gzhan yang ci khyod shes bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du rtog par byed dam/

'on te ma shes pas rtog par byed/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed dang 'dra na ni 'jig rten gsum po dag na chos kyi dbang phyug brnyes pa lha'i yang lha mdzad pa'i 'os ma yin no/ /dper na rgyal po'i dbang po la la zhig la gyad stong gi mchog tu gyur
