pa khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /gang la log pa'i blo gros mi dmigs shing / /chos rnams kun la khyod ni the tshom bral/ /de slad 'jig rten khyod dang 'dra ma mchis/ /'dren pa bde bar gshegs la gang bstod pa'i/ /bsod nams mi chung bdag gis bsags pas

na/ /bdag ni de yi dge ba'i las 'di yis/ /mi yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur bar shog /de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod

nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa brjod du med par nams kyang smyos pa dang glen par ma gyur to/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der 'dren pa skyes bu chen por gyur to/ /nams kyang log par ltung bar ma gyur to/ /nams kyang gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par ma gyur to/ /nams kyang gzhan gyi

ngor lta bar ma gyur to/ /nams kyang bskal pa brjod du med par tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par ma gyur to/ /thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes bya bar

gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu bzang skyong zhes bya ba de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes bya bar gyur to/ /thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du

sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mkhas pa'i snying por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu mkhas pa'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /

thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tsan dan snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyob byin zhes bya ba de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi

bu tsan dan snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ded

dpon bzang po de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang rigs kyi bu des pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' mes byin yin no/ /gang de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu blo gros 'chang zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni byang chub sems

dpa' bzang skyong yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na gang rigs kyi bu kun du 'dzin par gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na gang rigs kyi bu spobs pa mtha' yas su gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' chu'i lha yin no/ /thams cad zil gyis gnon pa

'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na bram

ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur to/ /thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi ngor mi blta bar 'dod

na chos kyi dbyings la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya/ 'grogs par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /chos zab mo mnyan pa'i phyir yongs su 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can du bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das

la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stobs bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed lags/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la yongs su zhu ba zhus lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa dang /

rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma rnams rdul phra rab tu byas kyang bgrang bar nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la

chos kyi dbyings su yongs su zhugs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dris pa ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/

mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na zhi ba'i phung po'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang

ldan par de bzhin gshegs pa/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba

'jig rten du byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang dge slong dpa' sra zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ yid gzhungs pa/ bye brag phyed pa/ rtogs pa/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la rim gro byed par gyur to/ /des de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du shin tu gus par byas te bshad pa rnams kyang gzungs su

'dzin cing rang gi don kyang mi gtong ste/ des de bzhin gshegs pa la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mnyes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs

pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis thog ma dang / bar dang / tha mar dus gsum du bstan pa rnams

yongs su bzung bar gyur to/ /de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des yang mnyes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur

te/ de dag thams cad la yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thog ma dang / bar dang / tha ma dus gsum du bstan pa rnams yongs su bzung ngo / /de'i 'og tu zla 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ de la de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cur gyur te/ de la yang byang chub

sems dpa' dpa' sra des bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/ yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur te/

nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa bstan to/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du chos thams cad nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur bstan te/ dpa' sra 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu'i chos thams

cad ni kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sra chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste/ ji lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob pas nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ des phyogs

bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa na byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong / kha cig ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa

du mas sems can rnams 'dul/ kha cig ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor/ kha cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de la zab mo'i

tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /zhi ba byang chub mtshungs med btsal slad du/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas 'das pa bye stong la/ /shin tu gus pa chen po bskyed nas su/ /sngon gyi 'dren pa dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /sems ni nams kyang gzhan

du ma bsams te/ /rtag par yid ni stong pa nyid la bzhag /chos rnams stong par bde bar gshegs pas bstan/ /de dag chos kyang yid kyis rnam par bsams/ /bdag tu smra ba mi gang mi mkhas pa/ /mu stegs can kun bdag gis zil gyis mnan/ /chos rnams

thams cad chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /de la bdag ni the tshom cang ma mchis/ /mig 'di dam pa'i don du stong par ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa thos nas rtogs/ /mig 'di mig tu mchis pa ma lags te/ /mdzangs pa ma lags mi rnams 'di la slad/ /nges par

sna lce rna ba de bzhin te/ /lus kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mchis ma lags/ /de bzhin sems dang sems pa'ang stong pa nyid/ /sems ni dben zhing rab tu stong pa lags/ /gzugs kyang gzugs kyis rnam par dben zhing stong / /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg kyang stong / /

chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid stong ste/ /skye mched de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /de bzhin khams kyang khams rnams nyid kyis stong / /bden pa'ang bden pas de bzhin stong pa ste/ /'di la mdzangs pa ma lags 'gro ba rnams kyang bslad/ /gang na'ang

stong par rig pa ma mchis par/ /nam mkha' bar snang bya yi rjes dang mtshungs/ /gang na'ang ngo bo nyid ni ma mchis pa/ /de ni nams kyang gzhan gyi rgyur mi 'gyur/ /gang gis ngo bo nyid ni mi rnyed par/ /rang bzhin de med ji ltar gzhan gyi rkyen/ /rang bzhin

med pa gzhan gyis ci zhig skyed/ /rgyu de bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'o/ /thams cad chos kyang mi g.yo brtan par gnas/ /mi 'gyur 'tshe ba ma mchis zhi ba ste/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rig pa ma mchis ltar/ /de la mi mdzangs 'gro ba myos par 'gyur/ /

ji ltar ri bo dag ni mi sgul ba/ /de bzhin chos rnams rtag tu bskyod mi nus/ /'chi 'pho ma mchis skye ba ma mchis pa'i/ /chos rnams de ltar rgyal bas rab tu bstan/ /gang gis yang dag chos rnams nges rtogs pa/ /des ni rgyal ba rnam 'dren bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /

gang la 'di 'dra'i nan tan ma mchis pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mchod ma bgyis/ /gang gis tshul bzhin rab tu chos rtogs pa/ /des ni rgyal ba bde gshegs bkur stir bgyis/ /de dag rgyal ba chos kyis mchod bgyis te/ /byang chub mchog tu de dag

'tshang yang rgya/ /gang gis tshul bzhin chos rnams rab rtogs pa/ /mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyang 'dzin/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa des bzung ste/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya/ /rgyal ba brgya yis stong pa nyid bshad de/ /

byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig rnams kyis bzung / /bde bar gshegs pa'i shul 'dir byang chub phyir/ /de la mkhas pa the tshom gzhar mi 'byung / /bde bar gshegs pas chos rnams gang bstan pa/ /chos nyid de ni de ring bdag gis

'tshal/ /'dren pa mi rnams kyi yang mchog tu 'gyur/ /shin tu sdug bsngal skye bo rnam par dgrol/ /'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rig pas na/ /bdag gis de ring chos kyi yab la mchod/ /gang slad mi yi gtso bo khyod 'phags pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyabs

su mchi/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po la stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang gzungs dang /

zhi gnas dang / shes rab kyis sems can thams cad zil gyis mnan to/ /'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' srar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sra zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de lta bas na 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pas stong pa nyid rnam par

thar pa'i sgo la bslab par bya'o/ /de la slob pa'i tshe yang sems gang la yang mi chags mi thogs te/ de'i sems ma chags shing thogs pa med pas bya ba gang dang gang la dmigs pa de dang de yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal nga stong pa nyid 'di la slob pa na/ ye

shes ji lta bu rab tu thob pas ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du 'gyur zhing gar 'dod pa der 'gyur ba'i ye shes de lta bu rab tu thob bo/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu 'das pa na rtag tu snang bar byas zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la

sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shugs 'chang zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad 'das pa na rin chen yod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na

nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i spyan zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug cu 'das pa na/ dge ba bsags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad sems pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya 'das pa na bai dUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de

bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi phung po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag gnyis 'das pa na gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong brgyad brgya 'das pa na zhi ba spyod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum 'das pa na sprin gyi kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum brgya 'das pa na yid du 'ong ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/

de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri brgyad stong 'das pa na me long dkyil 'khor snang

zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing

bye ba phrag brgyad cu 'das pa na zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rga shi 'joms pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char

sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'das pa na dus las 'das zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge sbyong rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal

shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tshe mnyam zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog

ces bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na zhi ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros dag pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems

can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen bkod pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na rin po che

kun du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char

sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas brtul zhugs spyad ces bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na yid grub ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams

kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na nges par

song ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud 'byung zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa

nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na grong rdal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes

bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na bde ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can

rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnas med par spyod ces bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams 'das pa na me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug ces bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar

gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na tsam pa'i kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa'i lha zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na lhas sprul pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod

de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams 'das pa na rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char

sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bdun cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar

shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bdun cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de

bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char gser gyis rab tu brgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gsol ba byed pa zhes

bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char gser gyi gtsug ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs dri ma sbyangs zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char

sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar

shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char snang ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing

brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na grags can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam

dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na gzi brjid can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'dzin

ces bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa drug gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na tshangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/

de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin chen

sgo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten slob dpon zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi

sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin po che'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing

brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin chen me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam

dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na shin tu mdzes zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs

pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs

pa mtha' yas snang ba zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na

nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal de lta bu'i rnam grangs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i tshe nga la sems can rnams kyis

ming tha dad par shes pa ni brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang shar gyi phyogs cha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /de bzhin du phyogs cha thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du nga la sems can rnams kyis ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par shes pa

yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i mtha' bde bar mi rig go/ /'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnams kyis nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos na mos par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang theg pa

'di la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rab tu mgu bar byas pa de dag kyang 'jam dpal nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos na the tshom skye bar 'gyur na nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa

can dang / de ma yin pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na yon tan rab tu bskyed pa zhes bya

ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga ni bram ze'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson

'grus mtha' yas de yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgyad cus yongs su bskor bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa dpag tu med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa nas theg pa brjod du med pa'i bar la

yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de'i rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa 'chad de/ nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de nas ngas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa thos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bas kyang shin tu rgya che ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i smon lam btab

nas bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bsngos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad

med pa yongs su dag par lung bstan mod kyi 'on kyang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma btang bar gyur nas de ltar ngas de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams la

bsnyen bkur byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /

brjod kyis mi lang 'khor ba na/ /bsam gyis mi khyab 'das pa'i dus/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya bskyed phyir/ /de na nga yis brtson 'grus brtsams/ /brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba/ /gang zag mtshungs pa med pa byung / /sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul/ /lhar

bcas 'jig rten rnams la ston/ /sangs rgyas chos la dbang byed cing / /stobs rnams kyi yang pha rol phyin/ /mi 'jigs pa la shin tu gnas/ /so so yang dag rig la mkhas/ /gnas dang gnas min dbang yang thob/ /las dang ye shes rtogs par rig /

las rnams yang dag 'dzin pa dang / /rnam par smin la the tshom med/ /khams rnams du mar shes pa dang / /rnam par 'dren pa shin tu ldan/ /sems can rnams kyi dad pa rnams/ /ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen/ /sems can rnams kyi dbang po

yi/ /rim pa bzhin du yang dag mkhyen/ /dbang po mchog dang tha ma rnams/ /ma lus par yang rab tu mkhyen/ /bsam gtan ye shes rnam thar dang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol phyin/ /snyoms par 'jug dang tshad med la/ /rkang gnyis dam pa shin

tu bslabs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin/ /des ni mi mkhyen gang yang med/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /gzigs pa la yang sgrib pa med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de la ngas/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya dris te/ /sangs

rgyas zhing gi rgya che ba/ /bskal pa chen po bdag la gsungs/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang / /ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen/ /gang rnams khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa/ /de 'dra'i chos ni yong ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi skyon rnams dang / /

yon tan thams cad rab tu mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa rgya che ba/ /rkang gnyis gtso bos bshad du gsol/ /sems can rnams kyi smin pa dang / /ji ltar mi rnams 'tshang rgya ba/ /nyon mongs gang gis nyon mongs pas/ /mi mkhas

'khor bar rab tu 'khor/ /mi rnams gang gis nyon mongs pa/ /nyon mongs de dag khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de yi lam dang bsam pa rnams/ /'dren pa khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen/ /ji ltar ting 'dzin 'byung ba dang / /byung nas ji ltar gnas pa dang / /ji

ltar de las ldang ba rnams/ /ston pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa/ /ji snyed ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / /zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong rnams/ /rnam pa thams cad shin tu mkhyen/ /ji ltar chos la 'dogs pa dang / gang

gi rkyen gyis bshad pa yang / /de yang ston pas rab mkhyen te/ /de la the tshom mi mnga' khyod/ /khyod kyis bskal pa byer spyad pas/ /ye shes 'di las nges par 'byung / /ston pas stobs kyi mthu yang brnyes/ /drang srong chen po stobs dang ldan/ /bskal pa stong

phrag bye ba yi/ /bdag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang / /spyod pa dpag tu ma mchis shing / /bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad mkhyen/ /gang du byang chub ci 'dra ba/ /skye ba thams cad du yang 'jug /de dag ma lus 'dren pa yis/ /ji lta bu yang rab tu mkhyen/ /gang du

ji 'dra skye ba dang / /gang du rigs kyang ci 'dra ba/ /ji ltar kun du spyad pa rnams/ /de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/ /tha ma'i chos rnams ci 'dra ba/ /'dren pas 'khor ba de rnams kyang / /'gro ba gang du skye ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen/ /ci 'dra ba yi

ye shes kyis/ /sngon chad rnam par lung bstan pa/ /mkhas pa khyod kyis de mkhyen pas/ /de la the tshom mi mnga' khyod/ /tshul khrims gang dang chos gang dang / /ci 'dra'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / /ye shes gang la zhugs pa yang / /de dag 'dren pas rab

tu mkhyen/ /gang dang gang gi las kyis su/ /skye ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rnam smin ci 'dra 'thob pa yang / /de dag mgon pos rab tu mkhyen/ /gang du gnas pa de dag gi/ /rgyun du mchi bar nges pa yang / /de yang khyod kyis ma lus mkhyen/ /de

slad yid gnyis mi mnga' khyod/ /gang gi lus kyis sems gang skyes/ /de yang khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen/ /sems de'i rgyu ni gang lags pa/ /de yang 'dren pas shin tu mkhyen/ /sngon chad gnas pa mkhyen pa ni/ /khyod dang 'dra ba yong ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas

bye ba stong rnams dang / /'dren pa khyod ni de dang 'dra/ /srog chags so so'i dge ba rnams/ /rjes su dran pas rab tu mkhyen/ /de slad sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /'dren pa'i ye shes thogs mi mnga'/ /gang dang gang gis lus kyis su/ /ji lta bu yi rgyud du

mchi/ /de yang thams cad mkhyen pas mkhyen/ /de slad rgyal bas lhag ma mchis/ /'dren pa chos rnams thams cad la/ /khyod ni the tshom yong mi mnga'/ /sems can kun gyi spyod yul yang / /sangs rgyas spyan gyis rab tu gzigs/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi

'pho mkhyen/ /khyod 'dra ba ni yong mi gda'/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad na/ /thub pa khyod las lhag ma mchis/ /zag pa zad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen/ /ma lus pa yang rtogs par gyur/ /nyon mongs thams cad yongs su spangs/ /khyod kyis bag chags

kun kyang bcom/ /sems can kun gyi nyon mongs dang / /spyod pa rnams kyang 'dren pas mkhyen/ /gang la nyon mongs spyod yul dang / /nyon mongs 'di dag gar 'byung mkhyen/ /nyon mongs dag la spyad pas na/ /bag chags rjes su 'jug pa rnams/ /de

dag kun kyang khyed mkhyen te/ /de las khyod ni pha rol phyin/ /bdag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang / /nyon mongs gang gis spong ba yi/ /lam de rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /de slad khyod ni lam la mkhas/ /'jig rten kun mgon rnam 'dren pa/ /mtha' yas

brtson 'grus de bstod nas/ /bskal bye khrag khrig mtha' yas par/ /'gro ba gnyis su de skyes so/ /'di nas lha ris nga skyes te/ /rtag par lha yi dbang por gyur/ /bye ba mtha' yas lha rnams la/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob par

bstan/ /lha yi gnas nas shi 'phos te/ /mi yi dbang po rgyal por gyur/ /sems can khrag khrig mtha' yas pa/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes thob par bstan/ /de dag nga yi chos thos nas/ /bsti stang mtshungs med bskyed nas su/ /sems ni thams cad

nyer gzhag ste/ /dri med sems kyis de dag nyan/ /sems can bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /byang chub mchog la nges par gyur/ /nga yi tshig thos rtogs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya

bshad kyang / /bskal pa khrag khrig mtha' yas su/ /rgya chen bshad pa mi zad do/ /sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod dang / /drang srong chen pos zhing bsngags pa/ /thams cad rang bzhin stong par bshad/ /de dag ma skyes mi 'gag bstan/ /gang 'dir

sangs rgyas bsngags pa dang / /sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang / /bde bar gshegs pas zhing brjod pa/ /gang gis bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /chos rnams zhi bar bde gshegs bshad/ /zhi ba'i rang bzhin de mi rnyed/ /gang la bshad pa de

yang stong / /'di la mgon med 'gro ba myos/ /de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas bud med

kyi dbang po las gyur te/ de phyin chad bud med kyi lus su mi skye bar gyur to/ /'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang bar 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon

par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgrub pa'i stong pa nyid sgrib pa med pa la bslab par bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul rab tu

'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg /'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun

du rab tu chem chem/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to/ /srog chags

bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad med pa phrag brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /byang chub sems

dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags stong phrag dpag tu med pa rnams dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu sngon sems ma bskyed pa rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa dkon

mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas slad kyis gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bar+N+Na sU tra ma hA yA na nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser gyi mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa

dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems ci ltar blta bar bgyi/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byang chub kyi sems ni gser dang rang bzhin 'dra bar gnas par blta bar bgyi'o/ /gser rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ltar byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par gnas so/ /mgar

bas gser la bzo'i bye brag tha dad par byas kyang gser rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba ltar/ byang chub kyi sems la yon tan khyad par sna tshogs par snang yang don dam par byang chub kyi sems las ma g.yos pas rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems nyid rnam par dag /bdag dang gzhan gyi don la brtson/ /dngos med ngo bo nyid du sgom/ /shes rab skye ba'i rgyu la mos/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan

pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa gser gyi mdo

zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs // @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bar+N+Na bA lu ko pa ma nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang /

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge

'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das

ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun

dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med do/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun

dga' bos lan gnyis su bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med do/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang yang ldan no/ /kun dga' bo khyod de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams kyi dpag tu med pa mnyan pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul shes pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan shes par 'dod dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos

'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ dge slong rnams kyis mngon sum du thos na yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom

ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis maud gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ji lta bus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu 'gro ba shes sam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ maud gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul

ji lta bus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu mchi ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod la don 'di dpes bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ kun dga' bo skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag dpes don rtogs par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo dper na rdzing dpag tshad brgyad stong pa chus gang ba/ bya khwas btung du rung bar mu dang kha da chad du 'dug pa/ pad ma'i lo mas khebs pa zhig yod

la de nas mi la la zhig gis rlung gi shugs las 'das pa'i rta mchog dag dang ldan pa'i lcags kyi shing rta la zhon te/ de yang mu khyud kyi shing yang chu la mi reg /rta rnams kyi rmig pa yang chu la mi reg /pad ma'i lo ma rnams kyang rta'i rmig pa dag gis mi brtol ba

tsam gyi stobs dang shugs dang mgyogs pa de lta bus rgyug la/ kun dga' bo de nas rdzing de'i nang nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas shing rta de mtsho'i nang nas phyir ma log pa de'i bar skabs su shing rta de lan brgyad bskor na/ kun dga' bo sbrul gdug pas shing rta lan cig

bskor ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su kun dga' bo khyod chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/ /kun dga' bo khyod tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su maud gal gyi bu chen po chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar

byed do/ /kun dga' bo maud gal gyi bu chen po tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/ /gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs

su rang sangs rgyas chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med pa ston to/ /rang sangs rgyas tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su byang chub sems dpa' chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/ /kun

dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su kun dga' bo gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri 'da'o/ /kun dga' bo rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa de lta bu'i 'gros kyis nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar

du ngal mi bso bar shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar

gyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du steng dang 'og gi phyogs su nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ngal mi bso bar song la/ de nas mi la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad ra bas bskor te ra bas bskor nas rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / gyo

dum med par byas te mthon dman med par byas nas grong khyer gcig tu byas la grong khyer gcig tu byas nas kyang yungs 'brus bkang ste byur bur byas na/ kun dga' bo grong khyer de'i nang gi yungs 'bru ji snyed yod pa de dag bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams

dag na sems can byang chub la zhugs pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub

sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag tu skye ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag na 'khod pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams

dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas 'chi 'pho ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi

khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag

na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na

byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang

chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la gces par byed pa'i mchog dang gus pa chen pos lan gsum bskor ba byed pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dag

ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /

de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa

chen po ston pa dag ngas mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pa dang gdung 'thun pa sha stag yin na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi snying

po la lta ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po la bskor ba byed pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po

ston pa mtshan tha dad pa dang gdung tha dad pa dag lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi 'byung ba dang / byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams ngas bstan pa gang dag tu sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni kun dga' bo dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i nang na gser gyi bye ma dkon pa dang 'dra ste/ kun dga'

bo de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni dkon te/ kun dga' bo ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po'i

bye ma dang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma de dag las la la zhig gis bye ma 'bru gcig blangs pa de bzhin du gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni

nyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig

rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nyA
barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
